title: 西门子能源紧急警报：专用 5G 核心中的关键漏洞 (CVSS 9.9) 暴露了敏感数据！
title_translated: Siemens Energy Emergency Alert: A critical hole in the 5G core exposed sensitive data!
summary: Elspec G5 Digital Fault Recorder contains a default certificate with managerial authority, allowing remote attackers to control the device and manipulate output.

title: 美国CISA警告 SinoTrack GPS 跟踪器存在远程控制漏洞
title_translated: US CISA warning SinoTrack GPS tracker has remote control gaps
summary: Weak identification defect and observable response difference in SinoTrack GPS equipment allowing remote control, tracking, and fuel cut-off.

title: 微软 Office 漏洞允许攻击者执行远程代码
title_translated: Microsoft Office bug allows the assailant to execute remote code
summary: Vulnerabilities in Microsoft Office allow attackers to enforce random codes on affected systems, affecting Windows, Mac, and Android platforms.
